item.title: Visualizing a Docker Swarm Cluster
item.description: Goal In a previous blog post I setup a docker swarm cluster. Now I want a way to visualize what the swarm cluster looks like. How many nodes I have and which containers are running. Also as I change the state of the swarm cluster through docker commands I’d like to visualize what is actually happening. The solution There is a docker image named dockersamples/visualizer that will give you a url that you can go to in order to view your swarm cluster.
